title: Add Privacy Policy and Terms of Service pages with footer links

requirements.text: Create a Privacy Policy page at route /privacy displaying all 9 sections: (1) Introduction, (2) Data Collection, (3) User Consent, (4) Data Usage, (5) Legal Compliance, (6) Data Security, (7) User Rights, (8) Transparency & Updates, (9) Contact. Render the full text provided by the user for each section. Style the page using the Global Nexus blue (#1A6FBF) and black (#1a1a1a) color theme, consistent with the rest of the platform. The Hindi/English language toggle UI must remain intact and functional; the legal text itself is displayed in English only regardless of the active language. Register the /privacy route in App.tsx.

quotes: Full Privacy Policy page with 9 sections from your upload
Both pages will match the global nexus blue-black color theme
Both pages will support the Hindi-English language toggle English text disabled, displayed with the toggle UI intact

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /privacy renders the Privacy Policy page without errors

The Hindi/English language toggle button remains visible and functional on the page
Legal body text is displayed in English regardless of the active language selection

requirements.text: Update the site footer to add 'Privacy Policy' and 'Terms of Service' links alongside the existing 'About' link. The Privacy Policy link must navigate to /privacy and the Terms of Service link must navigate to /terms. Both links must be visually prominent and consistent with the existing footer navigation style. The footer copyright line, Global Nexus branding, and all existing footer links (About, Contact, category links) must remain unchanged.
